original_text: And that doeth not any of those duties, but even hath eaten upon the mountains, and defiled his neighbour's wife,
korean_text: 산 위에서 제물을 먹거나 이웃의 아내를 더럽히거나

sentences.original_text: And that doeth not any of those duties
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 의무들 중 어느 것도 행하지 않으며

sentences.original_text: but even hath eaten upon the mountains
